title: Help
description: This is a bot that allows you to get clips from Twitch.

general_usage.name: Command Usage
general_usage.value: All commands can be used as slash commands.

commands.name: Set Command
commands.value: Use this command to set the streamer or game, whose/what game clips to get.

commands.name: Display Command
commands.value:
Use this command to display clips from the set streamer or game.
"<number_of_clips>" can be a value from 1 to 10.
By specifying 'ephemeral', you can (explicitly) set whether the clip's display results should be made public. (default: private)

commands.name: Day Command
commands.value:
Set the number of days to look back for clips.
The number of days can be specified up to 5 years (1825 days).

commands.name: Status Command
commands.value: Display current settings for clip fetching.

note.name: Note
note.value: Some commands may require "use application commands" permissions.

attention.name: Attention
attention.value:
About the command 'set'
When the category is Games, regarding uppercase and lowercase letters when specifying a game name, it will be recognized without issue as long as the game name you specified roughly matches the official game name. However, this is not the case for Streamers.
For Streamers, it should be exactly the same as the name of the streamer you want to specify.
